alert.note: Alert for Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Methow Valley; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Western Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 17 at 6:44AM PDT until July 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DRY, WINDY CONDITIONS TODAY... .The passage of a dry cold front will promote windy conditions today delivering critical fire conditions to much of central and eastern Washington. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE METHOW VALLEY, OKANOGAN VALLEY, FOOTHILLS OF CENTRAL WASHINGTON CASCADES, WATERVILLE PLATEAU, AND WESTERN COLUMBIA BASIN... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley (Zone 703), Fire Weather Zone 704 Methow Valley (Zone 704), Fire Weather Zone 705 Foothills of Central Washington Cascades (Zone 705), Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau (Zone 706) and Fire Weather Zone 707 Western Columbia Basin (Zone 707). * Winds: West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Local wind gusts up to 45 mph on the Waterville Plateau and benches along the Columbia River. * Relative Humidities: 15 to 25 percent. * Impacts: Any new and existing fires have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Methow Valley; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Western Columbia Basin
